casebody.data:
John Charles THOMAS, Appellant, v. Arthur J. SILLS. No. 18745. United States Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Submitted on Briefs Nov. 20, 1970. Decided Dec. 3, 1970. John C. Thomas, pro se. Eugene T. Urbaniak, Trenton, N. J. (George F. Kugler, Jr., Atty. Gen. of New Jersey, Joseph T. Maloney, Deputy Atty. Gen., Trenton, N. J., on the brief), for appellee.

Before HASTIE, Chief Judge, and MCLAUGHLIN and ADAMS, Circuit Judges.

OPINION OF THE COURT

PER CURIAM:

The judgment of the court below will be affirmed upon the opinion of Chief Judge Augelli, D.C., 320 F.Supp. 979.
